basic_info.description_header: Hello, I'm a developer with 10 Years IT Operations Experience
basic_info.description: During my eight years serving active duty in the US Air Force, I dragged 2-kilometer fiber reels across the desert, managed networks with thousands of users, led large scale technical projects covering hundreds of buildings, and liaised with the heads of lettered federal agencies. In the civilian world Iâ€™ve worked every tier of IT support, from customer help desk, to providing Tier III maintenance for an assortment of IT systems. I have been responsible for mission critical systems in literally life or death situations; while working with military, civilian, and foreign national professionals in six different nations. I have a broad educational background, including social science disciplines such as psychology, anthropology, and economics, as well as coursework in statistics, information science, and computer science. I believe the breadth and diversity of my experience lends itself to the analysis of a wide range of complex systems, and solving problems within them.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
